thread.section_title: Radisson Blu Edwardian Hampshire Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: One of the best
thread.title_full: One of the best - Review of Radisson Blu Edwardian Hampshire Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: davidpC851CM
title: One of the best
text: When we visit London, we always stay here. It's central and you can walk to most areas. The rooms are quiet and well presented. The reception staff are professional and friendly. The restaurant staff are friendly, professional and they actually remembered what we had chatted about the day before! Not cheap but you get what you pay for.
